q1: When do you think Bayern will win a European trophy?
a1: I would imagine within the next five years, certainly.
q2: What was Bayern's most expensive transfer?
a2: If I'm not mistaken, it is Couretin Tolisso.
q3: How will Bayern replace ribery and robben, who are both on their last year. With a big signing?
a3: I would rather see them develop youth players.
a4: Very likely but I see a decline in the near future
q5: Do you think their players are getting too old?
a5: As I said before, they need younger players.
